metadata.title: 100% PURE Glossy Locks: Grow More Shampoo (13.5 Fl Oz), Sulfate Free, Hair Growth Shampoo, Made with Biotin, Vitamin B3, For Fuller, Voluminous Hair
features: ENCOURAGES HAIR GROWTH - Instead of using toxic chemicals found in most hair growth products, our naturally formulated hair growth shampoo is fortified with vegan biotin, caffeine, and vitamin B3 (niacin) to stimulate hair growth for fuller, more voluminous hair
STRENGTHENS STRANDS - Vitamin B3 and biotin fortify roots and dry, brittle strands for hair that grows longer and stronger, to reduce shedding and breakage
NATURALLY CLARIFYING - We use mint and apple cider vinegar to gently cleanse scalp and strands of excess oil and product buildup in our clarifying shampoo
RESTORES VIBRANCY AND SHINE - This natural shampoo uses orange and sake to break away hair-dulling residue and restore shine for lustrous, enlivened hair
MADE WITHOUT HAIR HARMING INGREDIENTS - Our sulfate-free shampoos and conditioners are free of moisture-stripping detergents, harmful parabens, phthalates, PEGs, and artificial fragrances
